#### HELP

^h a  ......       eval   # any emacs/gnu topic? \
^h k  ......       F10     # keystroke  \
^h f current-buffer \ ^h f ess-eval-region (help for emacs/ESS function)

M-x apropos-documenation eval \
M-x describe-bindings \
M-x describe-mode
